text: Bent Mejding (14 January 1937 – November 2024) was a Danish actor, stage director, and theatre manager. He was known for his roles in Brothers (2004), We Shall Overcome (2008) and A Royal Affair (2012). Mejding died of pneumonia in November 2024 at the age of 87.Skuespiller Bent Mejding er død ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Danish stage actors Category:Danish television actors Category:Danish movie actors Category:Deaths from pneumonia
title: Bent Mejding
